articles.author: Kristy Puchko
articles.title: This Week In 'Seriously, F*ck That Guy': Ron Jeremy, Al Franken, And The Usual Sex Pests
articles.description: We're ready for women to inherit the earth. "Elder statesman of porn" Ron Jeremy has been accused of sexual assault or rape by more than a dozen women. Yes, consent still matters when you're working in porn. (Rolling Stone) Sylvester...
